name: Memory Warrior
description:
This game was made  for a game jam with the theme of memories but because of work I couldn't finish it in time but I decided to finish it and post it anyway on my account.

In the game, you must remember what where the cards shown in front of you and then use them logicaly do deal as much damage to fictive ennemies as you can before  taking damage because you only have one life. The more you advance in the game, the more cards will lbe on the field at the same time. Have fun and train your memories.

Ps. It would mean a lot to me if you could leave comments about what is good and what I should improve.
